name: Neon walk
description:
You jumped to weird hole. Now when you think about it was a bad idea. You found this strange world. It's up to you to escape this place and find what's at the END.

You'll have great fun with [character name] for couple of minutes.

CONTROLS:

  • WSAD - move
  • SPACE - jump

Earphones recommended 

If you encounter any bugs, comment.

Speedrun:  Best time 1.08 min - Kristof Johnson
